General.Name: Lanzhou Minbai Shareholding Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Lanzhou Lishang Guochao Industrial Group Co.,Ltd operates department stores in China and internationally. It offers various products, such as food, cosmetics, jewelry, clothing, footwear, sports goods, household appliances, etc. The company also operates hotels, restaurants, and boutique supermarkets. In addition, it constructs shopping malls and hotels. The company was formerly known as Lanzhou Minbaishareholding(Group) Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.
